item.title: WOM Tignes, France
item.dc:creator: Richard Carrillo
item.description:
One chalet, one designer, one work of art. 13 chalets, 13 renowned designers, a catalogue of unique chalets in the world. Add a dash of genius to your chalet, by choosing your artist from our selection of renowned designers. Each living space will thus be a one-off. The vision of the creators, their style and their artistic personality will transform your chalet into a piece of art. An exclusive way to work, unique in the mountain, for unprecedented creations dedicated to the mountain lifestyle... that come with added soul.
Timur Bozca designs 17 apartments with precious materials, elegant fabrics and exceptional fittings bringing interiors the ultimate level of sophistication. Stone and wood cover floors, walls and ceilings as a reminder of the natural surroundings. The space layouts have been meticulously well thought out. Each detail brings its own touch for a rare level of quality. Thanks to our collaboration with world-renowned designer Timur Bozca, the WOM experience is brought to the highest levels.
item.content:encoded:
THE MOST RESILIENT FRENCH RESORT, IN THE FACE OF CLIMATE CHANGE

One chalet, one designer, one work of art. 13 chalets, 13 renowned designers, a catalogue of unique chalets in the world. Add a dash of genius to your chalet, by choosing your artist from our selection of renowned designers. Each living space will thus be a one-off. The vision of the creators, their style and their artistic personality will transform your chalet into a piece of art. An exclusive way to work, unique in the mountain, for unprecedented creations dedicated to the mountain lifestyle… that come with added soul.

Timur Bozca designs 17 apartments with precious materials, elegant fabrics and exceptional fittings bringing interiors the ultimate level of sophistication. Stone and wood cover floors, walls and ceilings as a reminder of the natural surroundings. The space layouts have been meticulously well thought out. Each detail brings its own touch for a rare level of quality. Thanks to our collaboration with world-renowned designer Timur Bozca, the WOM experience is brought to the highest levels.

SPECIFICATION



Exclusive Services

WOM is a year-round destination that offers a full range of activities, leisure pursuits and relaxation facilities in order to enjoy this magnificent setting without a care in the world. Whether on one’s own or with friends or family our various areas are there to create unforgettable memories.

  • Concierge service
  • Signature Spa
  • Wellness Area
  • Aqualudic Area
  • Indoor And Outdoor Swimming Pools
  • Multisports Area
  • Ice Rink
  • Restaurant & Bar
  • Business Center
  • Seminar Area
  • Co-Working Area
  • Ski Shop & Ski Room
  • Organic Grocery Shop
  • Electric Shuttles

Eco Design

WOM Lays the foundations for more sustainable tourism in high-altitude resorts. Each square meter has been carefully considered to provide a remarkable mountain experience and designed to reduce its impact.
Each square meter has been carefully considered to provide a remarkable mountain experience and designed to reduce its impact.
All thoughts on layout, the use of light, and interior fixtures and fittings are based on local resources and constraints in order to blend in with the feel of the place and bring you the magic of Alpine living.

item.title: 401 Ocean Avenue
item.dc:creator: AgentImage
item.description:
Constructed with an appreciation for the past and a vision for the future, the exclusive new residences at 401 Ocean offer the opportunity to experience the finest in beachside living while holding an address steeped in California history.
The dual residences dubbed “The Landmark Homes” sit side by side within the Henry Wyse / Charles Morris House, designed by renowned architect and Santa Monica resident Robert D. Farquhar in 1910 with a Colonial Revival and Craftsman aesthetic. Known for his work on some of California’s most prestigious properties including The Owlwood Estate, The Canfield-Moreno Estate, and The California Club, original features of The Henry Wyse / Charles Morris House, such as the Tuscan-style entryway columns and the exterior redwood shingles, have been intricately preserved and restored.
item.content:encoded:
Constructed with an appreciation for the past and a vision for the future, the exclusive new residences at 401 Ocean offer the opportunity to experience the finest in beachside living while holding an address steeped in California history.

The dual residences dubbed “The Landmark Homes” sit side by side within the Henry Wyse / Charles Morris House, designed by renowned architect and Santa Monica resident Robert D. Farquhar in 1910 with a Colonial Revival and Craftsman aesthetic. Known for his work on some of California’s most prestigious properties including The Owlwood Estate, The Canfield-Moreno Estate, and The California Club, original features of The Henry Wyse / Charles Morris House, such as the Tuscan-style entryway columns and the exterior redwood shingles, have been intricately preserved and restored.
